name: OneBit Invaders (Playdate)
description:
A new revision of the classic.

Including:

  • Several enemies formations
  • One bit handmade graphics
  • Mini Bosses in formation
  • Selectable difficulty
  • High score saving
  • Extras when destroying UFOs:

   Extra life

   Fast fire

   Immortal bullets

   New barriers

   Shield

   Fast speed movement

Music Hhavok-intro (Resistor Anthems II), by Eric Skiff.

https://ericskiff.com/music/

Coded in LUA using PlayDate SDK by Oscar BraindeaD, 2022
